articles.author: Ali Asgar Nalwala
articles.title: Asian Champions Trophy 2023 hockey: Get schedule and watch live streaming - Olympics
articles.description: India, Pakistan, China, Korea, Malaysia and Japan will play for the Asian Champions Trophy 2023 hockey title. Get schedule and know where to watch live streaming.
articles.content:
The Indian mens hockey team will take on the Peoples Republic of China in its Asian Champions Trophy 2023 opener at the Mayor Radhakrishnan Stadium in Chennai on Thursday.
